path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - MultiplierBox Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Missing init ReentranceGuard contract in initialize function
findings.description: MultiplierBox contract does not initialize ReentranceGuard, which may cause the contract to malfunction if the ReentranceGuard state conflicts with the previous logic state of the proxy contract.

findings.title: Centralization Related Risks
findings.description: Centralization related risks are present in the contract.
